== wsload.m ==
Load all (or list of) variables of the base workspace into a function workspace

[http://guillaumemaze.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/matlab/codes/inout/wsload.m Download here]

{{{
% wsload Load all (or list of) variables of the base workspace into a function workspace
%
% [] = wsload([VLIST])
% 
% Load all variables of the base workspace into a function workspace.
% If VLIST is specified, only load variables given by cell array VLIST.
%
% Created: 2009-11-05.
% All rights reserved.
}}}
